description: Changed default (100%) speed to 130bpm, At the slowest warmup speed, this is approx 33bpm. If you can/once you can get to the the fastest possible speed (175%) this clocks in at around 227bpm in 16ths and triplet 8ths. This works out approximately 15 notes per second in 16ths and 11 notes per second in 8th triplets.
title: Scale sequences- 3 notes per string - A minor

description: Updated (4th October 2021) with new exercises added.
